Package
Description
DTO.UserDTO
Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) related to user information.
Entity
Domain entities that model core business concepts.
Enum
Enumerations used across the application for well-defined constant sets.
Exception
Custom exception types used to convey domain-specific error conditions.
Presentation
Presentation layer components (views, controllers) responsible for user interaction.
Repository
Data access layer responsible for reading and writing entities to underlying storage.
Service
Application service layer orchestrating business use-cases.
Service.AdminBroadcastNotifierService
Services responsible for delivering administrative broadcast messages.
Service.BookService
Services for book-related operations in the catalog.
Service.BookService.SearchStrategy
Strategy implementations for book search.
Service.BroadcastMessage
Services and data structures for broadcast messages.
Service.CDService
Services related to CD media items.
Service.CDService.SearchStrategy
Strategy implementations for CD search operations.
Service.Email
Email delivery services for application notifications.
Service.Fine
Fine management services and strategies.
Service.MediaItem
Services for managing media items across the catalog.
Service.NotificationSender
Abstractions and contracts for sending notifications.
Service.OverdueBorrowDetection
Detection of overdue borrowed items and related data models.
Service.OverdueBorrowNotifier
Orchestrates notifications for overdue borrowed items.
Service.Payment
Payment-related services and data structures.
Service.UserService
User management services.
Session
Session management abstractions and implementations responsible for tracking authenticated users.
Util
Utility classes shared across the application.
Util.CurrentLocalTimeDateResolver
Abstractions for obtaining the current date/time to support testability and time control.
Util.DateCalculator
Date and time calculation helpers used for durations, deadlines and scheduling.
Util.FxmlMapper
Mapping utilities between application roles or states and FXML view resources.
Util.FxmlNavigator
Navigation utilities for switching FXML-based views and managing stages/scenes.
Util.HashingPassword
Password hashing and verification utilities.
Util.MessageFormater
Message formatting strategies to construct user-facing messages.
Validation
Validation components that enforce input and domain constraints.
Validation.OverdueBorrowValidator
